page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: WORK IN THE STAUNTON ON WYE The main local employers are Bulmers and Sun Valley intensive poultry. A small plastics factory employs a few local workers, as does the Oakchurch PYO fruit farm. Other local farms are largely mechanized and employ just 1 or 2 workers. There are 2 motor mechanics working alone. In Mansell Gamage and Byford the largest employer is Garnons with a labour force of 27, divided between farm, maintenance and woodlands. Most other work is in Hereford 8 miles away, in factories, shops or offices. Sun Valley employ local women in their Hereford factory, transporting them in their own bus. There is some seasonal work such as fruit and daffodil picking.
